system.description:
Accelerates the natural growth of any living thing touched by the caster. The rate of increase is 100 (MS) or 300 (CS) times normal. Mature size does not change, just the time spent growing.

Verdant Hand cannot induce growth in things which are mature (fully grown). Dispelling the enchantment stops the accelerated growth, which then continues as normal.

 

Bonus Effects

CML60+Touch no longer required.

 

Range is CSI hexes.

 

Time: 25-CSI seconds

Range: Touch/CSI hexes at CML60+

Duration: CSI days
